data.title: NIMBLE: Non-parametrIc jeans Modeling with B-spLinEs
data.name: NIMBLE
data.description: A spherical Jeans modeling tool to compute a system's cumulative mass distribution from (observationally biased) 6D phase space coordinates

evidence: "NIMBLE is a tool for inferring the cumulative mass profile of a gravitating system (the Milky Way) from full 6D phase space coordinates of its tracers... via spherical Jeans modeling."
"Running `deconv.py` on the Latte m12i galaxy at LSR0 with Gaia DR3-like uncertainties..." followed by direct `python deconv.py ...` commands, indicating end-user execution of scripts.

"Clone the NIMBLE repository

```bash
https://github.com/nabeelre/NIMBLE.git
```" indicating distribution via cloning the source repository.
